Class RemoteGameMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.model.game.RemoteGameMaster

  • public class RemoteGameMaster
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is charged to fully manage a remote game

        queue - the queue that will manage the http requests

        gameActivity - the acrivity where the game runs
